title: Food Pantries/ Banks
name: Food Pantries/ Banks
description: This map provides information on food assistance programs.

properties.name: St. Margaret's Community Outreach
properties.description: 305 Tanner St, Carrollton, GA 30117 (Temporary Location) 606 Newnan St permanent location late 2012 Must call to be given an appointment time(770) 834-5282

properties.name: Carroll County Soup Kitchen
properties.description:
nonprofit
organization operated by volunteers to serve a hot meal in the LAST FULL WEEK
of EACH MONTH (except December(770) 214-5055

properties.name: Manna House Food Pantry
properties.description: Distributes food to everyone who comes to us for help for the first time every day except Sunday. After that their financial situation is evaluated for further distribution based on appropriate income levels. (770) 834-5755

properties.name: Open Hands United Christian Ministry
properties.description: Open Tues/Thurs 2-4pm for assistance with food, Bibles, reading glasses, blankets and warm winter clothing -- assistance can be provided every 2 months -- some very limited financial assistance can be provided -- our days and hours for this assistance is the process of being changed.

properties.name: First Christian Food Pantry
properties.description:
open
the SECOND TUESDAY OF EACH MONTH from 9am - 11am. Open to everyone, no calls
ahead of time, must physically show up to receive assistance.

properties.name: Life Line Mission Choice Pantry
properties.description: Tuesdays and Fridays weeklyMUST call 770 838 7525 to make an appointment, can’t just show up.

properties.name: Deeper Life Christian Center's Food Pantry
properties.description: Food is given out on the 4th Saturday at 10am, no appointment needed.
